job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Job DescriptionDevOps style SREs with the skills listed belowDistributed systems knowledge like Hadoop/HBase, Kafka etcAverage coder in Java.Python + Shell scripting knowledge is a plus.Production maintenance experience.Basic Kubernetes knowledge.Telemetry domain knowledge is huge plus.
